Primary Contact: Mary Lamoureux, Program Lead and Clinical Nurse Specialist
Service Details: - Offers a specialized outpatient multidisciplinary treatment service for resident youth and adults diagnosed with anorexia or bulimia nervosa- Includes group therapy, group education, family support, individual therapy, nutritional counselling, psychiatric consultation and/or consultations to allied health care providers
Eligibility: Referrals for people under age 19 must be first submitted to Child and Youth Mental Health Intake who will refer to the Eating -Disorders program as appropriate
How to Apply: - Please contact your family doctor for a full assessment and diagnosis relevant to this referral- Referral forms can be forwarded to your doctor by calling 250.870.5777
Address & Map: Community Health & Services Centre505 Doyle AveKelowna, BC     V1Y 0C5View MapQuest Map
Print Material: Please contact the Kelty Resource Centre of BC (KRC) for educational materials or resource recommendations, 1.800.665.1822
